profile:
SiteWorx Concrete Ltd. provides professional concrete services for the residential and commercial markets in Calgary and surrounding areas.
We specialize in installing exposed aggregate, stamped concrete, broom finishes, and sandblast finishes for Driveways, Patios and sidewalks.
Our goal is to give you a finished product that exceeds your expectations and increases your property value.
name: SiteWorx Concrete Ltd

profile:
WELCOME TO RIVERSIDE CONTRACTING
We hope that you will find inspiration here!

Riverside Contracting specializes in epoxy coatings, decorative concrete, polished concrete, garage floor coatings, traditional concrete applications and more. Concrete today is used for so much more than just a structural element. Through one of our many processes we can add immense aesthetic value to your home or commercial space. We have been involved in the concrete industry for over 15 years, so if you are looking for a knowledgeable concrete specialist – trust in us! We are confident you will love our completed creations. Serving Calgary and surrounding areas.

WHY RIVERSIDE CONTRACTING
Our flowing ingenuity transforms innovative concrete scenarios and colours for the purpose of residential, industrial or commercial applications. Decorative designs can help increase the resale value of your home or present your business space in the best way possible. Visualizing what your completed project might look like? Have a certain coating or colour in mind? Call us – we have many options available.
services:
Polished concrete

Concrete staining & dyes

Overlays & repairs

Epoxy, urethane

  & sealers

Surface preparation

Garage floor coatings

Garage Design and Organization

profile:
We clean, refresh, and seal your exposed aggregate and stamped concrete patios and driveways. 

We are a local owner operated business focused on service and quality. With over 10 years experience in residential and commercial coatings we are your trusted source for your home. Our  premium commercial grade high gloss acrylic sealants ensure your home will look its' best.   

We take pride in our work and ensure 100% satisfaction before the job is done.
name: Calgary Driveway Sealing
